original_text: And they shall look unto the earth; and behold trouble and darkness, dimness of anguish; and they shall be driven to darkness.
korean_text: 땅을 굽어보아도 환난과 흑암과 고통의 흑암뿐이리니 그들이 심한 흑암 가운데로 쫓겨 들어가리라

sentences.original_text: And they shall look unto the earth;
and they shall be driven to darkness.
